name: Connected through fate ~ Otome visual novel (alpha demo)
name_original: Connected through fate ~ Otome visual novel (alpha demo)
description:
NEWS

August .18.2022 Release of the Alpha Demo version of Connected through fate
~ CTF ~ starts today!!
The demo will also be released on Steam at a later date.
(You found a Bug or a spelling mistake in the Demo? Please let us know and send us a screenshot: E-Mail Chokiko@web.de) Thank you for your support! <3






Connected through fate is a visual novel/ otome game with four playable routes. You get the chance to follow the story of our heroine and make certain decisions. You can give the main character your own first and last name. Each route has two endings, one good and one bad. How the story ends depends on your decisions, as well as which route you end up in.

Important! Please note that the game will be released in German and if the funding on Kickstarer is successful, there will also be an English text edition. Please understand that the English edition will not be a professional translation. Due to the too high costs. However, we will do our best to translate everything meaningfully. 

If you want to get an idea of the quality of the translation, feel free to play the demo version of Connected through fate, which contains the complete prologue.

The game has an age rating from 16 years due to sexual as well as violent allusions.

You pay for the game once and have access to all content. A Steam and Itch.io version will be released at launch.

Planned release of the game is in early 2023!

Connected through fate tells the story of our heroine, who is about to move with her mother to a new city. At her new school, she gets acquainted with the three strange Ichigawa brothers. The three brothers could not be more different, and so their first day is already extremely turbulent.

But it's not just these strange encounters that will soon turn her entire life upside down!



The project is our first visual novel and was started a few years ago and has continued to evolve after a long break. Some stories want to be told to the end! So let us tell this story and give you the opportunity to experience your chosen ending.

A lot of love and work went into this project. We want to get the best out of our given resources and give you a unique experience. 

We will publish the game for Steam and Itch.io in German. An English text edition will be released, if the project will be funded on Kickstarter.

With Connected through Fate we want to tell a deep, exciting but dramatic story. Through the four main characters and a total of 8 different endings, the player will be able to explore the characters and take his fate into his own hands.  

Kickstarter will get a beta access for the game on Steam once Connected through fate launches into beta phase. We would like to sincerely thank all those who support us in the realization of this project! You are great!



 Takeo is your dear classmate who catches you as soon as you fall.

Ryota is a rock star who seems to have no problem with closeness.





Katsuro is your teacher, but he seems to have a strange dark side.



Seiichi is your stepbrother, although he annoys you sometimes, but he seems to worry about you all the time.





Hi there! I hope you are doing well. If you landed here on our project, then you probably share the same love for the visual novel as I do! My love for this genre is so big that I have the dream to tell a story in my own visual novel. And this is how we ended up here! I hope you have as much fun playing Connected through fate as we had been fun realizing this project.

Our team consists of three people. 

Xandarius: Is responsible for the scripting and the translation of the game. 

Sebastian: Contributed most of the music for the game.

Chokiko: Wrote the story and did the drawings of the characters and GUI. 

Backgrounds in the game as well as the voice accents were purchased from third parties.

Notice

We have only tested the game on Windows. If you want a Mac or Linux version, feel free to contact us and we will upload it at a later date.
